jsx.http.rpc.remote.client
Class CClass

java.lang.Object
  jsx.http.rpc.remote.Objective
      jsx.http.rpc.remote.client.CObject
          jsx.http.rpc.remote.client.CClass

public final class CClass
extends CObject

A client reflection to java.lang.Class with the help of Reflector.

Note that a object of this class is an Objective at client-side in that when finalized it automatically tries to asynchronously dereference its server-side entity.

Author:
J.J.Liu (Jianjun Liu) at http://www.jscripter.org

Constructor Detail

CClass

protected CClass(Reflector reflector,
                 Remote remote)

The typical constructor for a CClass reflection.

Parameters:
reflector - The Reflector object associated with the CClass object being constructed.
remote - The underlying Remote object associated with the CClass object being constructed.
Since:
1.0
Method Detail

create

public static CClass create(Reflector reflector,
                            Remote remote)

Synchronously creates a CClass reflection from a Remote object with a Reflector.

This method synchronously increases server-side references to the Remote object.

Parameters:
reflector - The Reflector object associated with the CClass object being constructed.
remote - The underlying Remote object associated with the CClass object being constructed.
Returns:
The created CClass reflection.
Since:
1.0

create

public static void create(Reflector reflector,
                          Remote remote,
                          Returnable<CClass> rt)

Asynchronously creates a CClass reflection from a Remote object with a Reflector.

This method asynchronously increases server-side references to the Remote object.

Parameters:
reflector - The Reflector object associated with the CClass object being constructed.
remote - The underlying Remote object associated with the CClass object being constructed.
rt - A Returnable to return the created CClass reflection.
Since:
1.0

forName

public static final CClass forName(java.lang.String name,
                                   Reflector ref)

Synchronously asks server-side to load a named class and return it as a CClass reflection.

Parameters:
name - The name of the class to load.
ref - The Reflector object providing the service.
Returns:
The CClass reflection for the loaded class.
